item.title: Enforce uniform code formatting across teams
item.description: Enforce uniform code formatting across teams Link to heading With the rise of language centric formatting tools like gofmt, it’s become easier than ever to achieve a holistic coding style across team members and projects, avoiding endless warfare over primeval subjective matters like white space after punctuation, tabs vs. Spaces, etc… It also combats the cargo cult around style guides promoted by large tech companies (such as the AirBnB JS Guide) - although these are still around, they’ve become much more focused on overall code architecture and idiomatic usage of their governed language.
